backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing user profiles, game metadata, templates, categories, high scores, and game state persistence with access control integration for authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: GamePlayer iframe rendering, game catalogue integration with backend, and game state persistence with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, styles, and configuration with detailed descriptions of functionality and implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with black/dark backgrounds and custom design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph tags, Twitter Card metadata, JSON-LD structured data, PWA manifest link, and canonical URL for Nexora AI platform.
frontend/public/demo.html: Standalone interactive demo page with dark theme styling, tabbed navigation, and embedded styles showcasing Neroxa AI features using OKLCH color system.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining Neroxa AI app metadata, icons, display mode, theme colors, and orientation for progressive web app installation.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all user agents to crawl all pages without restrictions.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all main application routes with priorities, change frequencies, and last modified dates for search engine indexing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that sets up routing with TanStack Router and renders the header, chat sidebar, and tabbed interface for various features (math solver, translator, media, music, art, scripter, games). Manages session selection and sidebar collapse state.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Interactive drawing canvas component with color palette, brush size controls, eraser tool, and AI art idea generator chat. Supports saving artwork locally and sharing via generated URLs with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar that displays chat session history with timestamps, allows creating new chat sessions, and handles session selection. Shows loading states and formats relative timestamps (e.g., '5m ago').
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Chat interface component that displays messages for a specific session with user/assistant avatars, handles message input with Enter key support, and simulates AI responses with typing indicators. Auto-scrolls to latest messages.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary class component that catches and displays errors with a styled error card, showing error details and providing 'Try Again' and 'Reload Page' recovery options.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Card component for displaying game metadata with thumbnail, title, category badge, description, and play button. Features hover effects with play icon overlay and click-to-play functionality.
frontend/src/components/GamePlayer.tsx: React component that renders an iframe-based game player with fullscreen support, high score tracking, and embedded game templates (Snake, Pong, Breakout, Tetris, Space Invaders). Communicates with parent window via postMessage to update scores.
frontend/src/components/GamesView.tsx: Main games catalog view component with search, category filtering, and pagination (24 items per page). Displays game cards in a responsive grid and opens GamePlayer modal when a game is selected.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, theme toggle (light/dark), authentication status display, sign-out button, and conditional ProfileSetup dialog for new users.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: Math problem solver with difficulty levels (K-2 through 11-12), teacher mode for concept explanations, and homework helper mode with chat-style history. Evaluates expressions client-side and generates step-by-step solutions.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: Tabbed interface for AI-generated images and videos with prompt input, generation buttons, and display grid. Shows loading states and upload progress for media generation.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: Music generation component with two modes: AI-generated music from text prompts and a beat pattern sequencer with kick/snare/hihat sounds. Includes playback controls, tempo slider, sharing functionality, and audio download.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: A modal dialog component for initial user profile setup that prompts for a name and saves it using the useSaveCallerUserProfile hook with loading states.
frontend/src/components/Scripter.tsx: A code generation chat interface that allows users to describe coding tasks and receive generated code snippets with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: A viewer component for displaying shared artwork or music content by ID, handling loading/error states and providing navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: A translation interface with language selection dropdowns (10 languages) and chat-style display of translation history with clear functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating anonymous or authenticated actors based on Internet Identity and initializing access control with admin tokens.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Provides art idea generation based on user input keywords (animals, landscapes, abstract, portraits, fantasy, space, flowers, food) with randomized suggestions for each category.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: Handles artwork sharing by generating local artwork IDs and providing URL copy functionality; backend sharing support has been removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Custom React hook that generates simple synthesized audio using the Web Audio API based on text prompts, creating melodies from a C major scale and converting AudioBuffer to WAV blobs.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Custom React hook that manages canvas drawing state and operations including brush color, size, erasing, and touch/mouse event handling for a drawing interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Custom React hook for managing chat sessions that returns empty data since the backend no longer supports session persistence; provides mock implementations for session creation and message handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameCatalogue.ts: Custom React hooks using React Query to fetch game metadata, templates, categories, and search games from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Custom React hooks for fetching and updating game high scores using React Query mutations with toast notifications for success/error feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Custom React hook that simulates AI image and video generation by creating placeholder media with gradient backgrounds and text overlays using HTML canvas.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: Custom React hook for sharing music that generates local music IDs and provides URL copying functionality; backend persistence is no longer supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useScriptGeneration.t: React hook for managing AI script generation with mock implementations that return code snippets (React, Python, JavaScript, API, Calculator) based on user requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: React Query hooks for fetching shared artwork and music content that currently throw errors indicating these features are no longer supported by the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: React hook for managing text translation with mock implementations that return simple translations for common phrases (greetings, thanks) in multiple languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles via the backend actor, with toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for a dark-themed educational app using OKLCH color space, featuring teal primary and coral accent colors with sidebar styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/errorLogger.ts: Error logging utility class that maintains a circular buffer of log entries with severity levels and outputs to console with appropriate methods.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file for Neroxa AI, a media streaming platform with AI-generated playable games. Tracks existing features for game rendering, catalogue integration, and state persistence, plus pending feature requests for backend game generation and game templates.
